name: 配置信息
func:
let address = "10.10.1.5:5556"
let maa_path = "/data/env/maa"
let maa_cache = maa_path + "/cache"
let maa_api = "https://ota.maa.plus/MaaAssistantArknights/api/resource/tasks.json"
let adb_path = "/data/env/adb/adb"
let touch_mode = "maatouch"
let containerId = msg.payload.replace(/\n/g,"")
let scrcpyWebContainerName = "ws-scrcpy"

let config = {
    "address": "10.10.1.5:5556",
    "maaPath": maa_path,
    "maaCache": maa_path + "/cache",
    "adbPath": "/data/env/adb/adb",
    "touchMode": "maatouch",
    "containerId": containerId,
    "containerName": "NodeRedv2Beta2",
    "scrcpyWebContainerName": "ws-scrcpy",
    "maaApi": "https://ota.maa.plus/MaaAssistantArknights/api",
    "arknightsUrl": "https://ak.hypergryph.com/downloads/android_lastest"
}

global.set("address",address)
global.set("maaPath",maa_path)
global.set("maaCache", maa_cache)
global.set("maaApi", maa_api)
global.set("adbPath",adb_path)
global.set("touchMode",touch_mode)
global.set("scrcpyWebContainerName",scrcpyWebContainerName)
global.set("config",config)

return msg;

name: 存储uuid
func:
global.set("uuid",msg.payload.uuid)
return msg;

工具栏时间
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">

$(function() {
    if($('.md-toolbar-tools').length != 0){
        loadClock();
    }else setTimeout(loadClock, 500)
});

function loadClock(){
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toLocaleString());
    }

    if(document.clockInterval){ 
            clearInterval(document.clockInterval);
            document.clockInterval = null;
    }
        
    document.clockInterval = setInterval(upTime,1000);
}

</script>

name: 获取镜像
保存信息
func:
let asset_name = msg.payload.asset_name
let mirrors = msg.payload.mirrors
// 由于第一个地址下载失败，暂时修0为1
let download_url = mirrors[2]
let download_path = "/data/env/" + asset_name
flow.set("downloadUrl",download_url)
flow.set("downloadPath",download_path)
return msg;
